com.bandyer.android_sdk.utils

Class DeviceInfo

  • com.bandyer.android_sdk.utils.DeviceInfo

  • public class DeviceInfo

    Helper class for accessing hardware specifications, including the number of CPU cores, CPU clock speed and total available RAM.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DeviceInfo INSTANCE
      Helper class for accessing hardware specifications, including the number of CPU cores, CPU clock speed and total available RAM.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCpuMaxFreqKHz()
      Method for reading the clock speed of a CPU core on the device. Will read from either /sys/devices/system/cpu/cpu0/cpufreq/cpuinfo_max_freq or /proc/cpuinfo.
      int getDEVICEINFO_UNKNOWN()
      The default return value of any method in this class when an error occurs or when processing fails (Currently set to -1). Use this to check if the information about the device in question was successfully obtained.
      int getNumberOfCPUCores()
      Reads the number of CPU cores from the first available information from /sys/devices/system/cpu/possible, /sys/devices/system/cpu/present, then /sys/devices/system/cpu/.
      long getTotalMemory(android.content.Context c)
      Calculates the total RAM of the device through Android API or /proc/meminfo.

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static DeviceInfo INSTANCE

        Helper class for accessing hardware specifications, including the number of CPU cores, CPU clock speed and total available RAM.

    • Method Detail

      • getDEVICEINFO_UNKNOWN

        public int getDEVICEINFO_UNKNOWN()

        The default return value of any method in this class when an error occurs or when processing fails (Currently set to -1). Use this to check if the information about the device in question was successfully obtained.

      • getNumberOfCPUCores

        public int getNumberOfCPUCores()

        Reads the number of CPU cores from the first available information from /sys/devices/system/cpu/possible, /sys/devices/system/cpu/present, then /sys/devices/system/cpu/.

        Returns:
        Number of CPU cores in the phone, or DEVICEINFO_UKNOWN = -1 in the event of an error.

      • getCpuMaxFreqKHz

        public int getCpuMaxFreqKHz()

        Method for reading the clock speed of a CPU core on the device. Will read from either /sys/devices/system/cpu/cpu0/cpufreq/cpuinfo_max_freq or /proc/cpuinfo.

        Returns:
        Clock speed of a core on the device, or -1 in the event of an error.

      • getTotalMemory

        public long getTotalMemory(android.content.Context c)

        Calculates the total RAM of the device through Android API or /proc/meminfo.

        Parameters:
        c -

        • Context object for current running activity.

        Returns:
        Total RAM that the device has, or DEVICEINFO_UNKNOWN = -1 in the event of an error.
